query:
INSERT INTO caseStudies (title, businessType, challenge, solution, results, timeSaved, costSaved, roiPercentage, industry, location, tierRequired) VALUES

('Brisbane Retail Business Transforms Content Creation',
'Retail Business',
'Owner was spending 6+ hours each week writing emails and social posts, taking time away from core business operations and customer service.',
'Implemented Tech Horizon Labs prompt templates for email and social media content creation. Used the Email Accelerator and Content Creator prompts with customization for brand voice.',
'Cut content creation time from 6+ hours to just 45 minutes per week. Content quality improved with more consistent brand voice and better engagement rates.',
'5.25 hours per week',
'Estimated $15,000 annually in labor costs',
875,
'Retail',
'Brisbane, Australia',
'starter'),

('Melbourne Electrician Automates Admin Work',
'Trade Services',
'As a tradesperson working long days on job sites, spending hours each night on admin tasks like quoting and customer follow-ups was unsustainable and affecting work-life balance.',
'Automated quoting process and customer follow-ups using AI prompt templates. Implemented the Customer Whisperer and Email Accelerator prompts for consistent communication.',
'Saved hours of admin work previously done at night. Now completes quotes and follow-ups in minutes instead of hours, improving response time and customer satisfaction.',
'6+ hours per week',
'Estimated $18,000 annually in time savings',
600,
'Trade Services',
'Melbourne, Australia',
'lite'),

('Marketing Agency Scales Content Production',
'Marketing Agency',
'Agency was spending 3-5 hours per week creating social posts for clients, limiting the number of clients they could serve profitably.',
'Implemented the Content Creator prompt with customization for each client''s brand voice and industry. Created reusable prompt templates for different content types.',
'Reduced social post creation time by 70%. Can now serve 3x more clients with the same team size. Content quality remains high with better consistency.',
'3-4 hours per week per client',
'Increased revenue capacity by $50,000 annually',
400,
'Marketing',
'Sydney, Australia',
'pro'),

('Sales Team Improves Follow-up Consistency',
'B2B Services',
'Sales team was inconsistent with follow-up emails, leading to lost opportunities. Writing personalized follow-ups was time-consuming and often delayed.',
'Implemented the Email Accelerator and Sales Script Perfector prompts. Created templates for common scenarios and objections. Trained team on prompt customization.',
'Follow-up response time improved from 48 hours to 4 hours. Conversion rate increased by 25%. Sales team now sends 3x more personalized follow-ups.',
'4-6 hours per week per salesperson',
'Increased sales by $120,000 annually',
500,
'B2B Services',
'Perth, Australia',
'lite');
